name: HorseyToken

attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation: @dev Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.
attributes.name: renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
attributes.name: Pausable

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
attributes.name: pause

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
attributes.name: unpause

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev HorseyExchange contract - handles horsey market exchange which
includes the following set of functions:
1. Deposit to Exchange
2. Cancel sale
3. Purchase token*
attributes.name: HorseyExchange

attributes.documentation: @dev initialize

attributes.name: setStables

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the owner to change market fees
@param fees The new fees to apply (can be zero)
attributes.name: setMarketFees

attributes.documentation: @return the tokens on sale based on the user address
attributes.name: getTokensOnSale

attributes.documentation: @return the token price with the fees
attributes.name: getTokenPrice

attributes.documentation:
@dev User sends token to sell to exchange - at this point the exchange contract takes
ownership, but will map token ownership back to owner for auotmated withdraw on
cancel - requires that user is the rightful owner and is not
asking for a null price
attributes.name: depositToExchange

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Exchange is not allowed to transfer"

attributes.value: Exchange is not allowed to transfer

attributes.name: nonZeroPrice

attributes.documentation:
@title Adds rank management utilities and voting behavior
@dev Handles equities distribution and levels of access
EXCHANGE FUNCTIONS IT CAN CALL
setClaimingFee OK 5
setMarketFees OK 1
withdraw
TOKEN FUNCTIONS IT CAN CALL
setRenamingCosts OK 0
addHorseIndex OK 3
setCarrotsMultiplier 8
setRarityMultiplier 9
addLegitDevAddress 2
withdraw
PAUSING OK 4
attributes.name: HorseyPilot
